.. _cli_reference:

############################
Command-Line Interface (CLI)
############################

Welcome to the complete reference guide for the ``k-diagram``
command-line interface. This section provides detailed documentation
for every command, organized by its analytical purpose.

Whether you're performing initial data exploration, evaluating complex
probabilistic forecasts, or diagnosing model uncertainty, you'll find
the tools you need here.

Start with the :doc:`introduction` for an overview of the core concepts
and common conventions shared across all commands.
